title: Step 1: Send Us Your Idea
description: Fill out our quote form or shoot us a message. Let us know what you’re thinking—artwork, colors, shirts, timeline.

title: Step 2: Approve Your Mockup
description: We’ll send a digital mockup so you can see your design on the actual shirt style and color.

title: Step 3: We Print It
description: Every shirt is printed in-house using top-quality inks and processes we trust. No outsourcing.

title: Step 4: Pick Up or Ship Out
description: Come by our Monroe studio to pick up your order, or let us ship it straight to your door.
